channel.title: Experience rate system
channel.description:
Having a near perfect experience rate system is one of the most vital things in a server. If you have it too high, people will get bored and if it is too low, people will get bored. I'm trying to create a system to where players know what they are getting themselves into, so here is what I have so far:
On the player's first log in, they will have a choice to select three difficulties, each with their own experience rate modifier:
[ul][li]Rookie - Experience * 500[/li] [li]Knight - Experience * 50[/li] [li]Elite - Experience * 10[/li][/ul]
As I mentioned before, players will have the choice to do whatever they would like, but the difficulty you choose will effect experience rates and other factors that I have not yet decided, such as drop rates.
Every skill uses this experience modifier, even combat; however, combat is different. My current combat system takes the damage you apply and multiplies it by 10. Once that is done, it multiplies that by your difficulty experience rate. [b]For example: [/b]If you hit a 10 and you are in elite experience difficulty, you will receive 1000 experience for that hit.
I'm wanting my system to make each skill be a challenge, but something that is in the medium of time that will be needed to receive 99. If you have any suggestions/comments about this system and how it can be improved/modified, please post below.

item.title: Experience rate system
item.dc:creator: @Jaxus Jaxus
item.description:
@Jaxus wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:10, topic:458187”][quote author=Jaxus link=topic=561110.msg4094823#msg4094823 date=1346726207]

Well elite is supposed to be hard! Maybe 5x, 25x, and 100x?

5x is too hard. I think I’m just going to go with 5x, 25x and 100x. I don’t think I’m going to add another difficulty.
[/quote]
Why not just

Dipshit - Master
Noob - x100
Not as bad - x50
Good - x25
L33t - x1

Change the names obviously, I cant think fo anything, no sleep for 24 hours, barely awake, etc.[/quote]
Get some rest man; this stuff isn’t nearly as important as your mental well-being.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Dark_Wing wrote:

Davidi2:

Should be 1x, 10x, and 50x I think.

1x is too hard and will take forever…

It should be 10x 25x 50x 100x in my opinion. My players enjoyed those rates but every community is different!
